snippet: The Palestine Liberation Organization responds to recent coverage of the Palestinians’ bid to seek full membership in the United Nations.
lead_paragraph: The Palestine Liberation Organization responds to recent coverage of the Palestinians’ bid to seek full membership in the United Nations.

headline.main: The Palestinians’ U.N. Bid: How the P.L.O. Sees It
headline.print_headline: The Palestinians’ U.N. Bid: How the P.L.O. Sees It
